item.title: Private Transfers from Spirit of Tasmania to The Hotel Windsor, Victoria
item.description:
Why the Spirit of Tasmania is a Key Travel Link

The Spirit of Tasmania ferry service is a vital connection between Victoria and Tasmania, offering a comfortable and scenic way to travel across Bass Strait. If you’re travelling from The Hotel Windsor, the ferry terminal at Geelong provides convenient access to this unique journey. Whether you’re heading to Tasmania for a holiday, work, or to visit family, you’ll benefit from:

item.title: Airport Transfers from Melbourne & Avalon to The Hotel Windsor, Victoria
item.description:
Why Melbourne Airport Is a Top Choice for Travellers from The Hotel Windsor

Melbourne Tullamarine Airport is Victoria’s premier travel hub — serving millions of passengers with both domestic and international flights. If you’re based in The Hotel Windsor, this airport offers unmatched convenience, excellent facilities, and global connectivity.
